column1: Geography: Canada, Geographical region of Canada, Province or territory, Census metropolitan area, Census agglomeration

column2: Data for periods prior to January 2007 were calculated by linking 1997=100 data (see CANSIM table 327-0005) to the average of the 12 months of 2007.

With the release of the January 2017 New Housing Price Index (NHPI), CANSIM table 327-0046 has been archived and replaced by CANSIM table 327-0056 as a result of changes to the geographic coverage and base period for the indexes.

column1: How to cite: Statistics Canada. Table 18-10-0052-01  New housing price index (2007=100)
